STM: Struggling with the workload in Intro to Comp Sci class.
Flood of homework is overwhelming.

MTM.Summary: Balancing coursework and personal life is challenging.
MTM.Patterns: Difficulty with workload, feeling overwhelmed, time management issues
MTM.Goals: Improve coding skills, manage time better, adapt to academic rigor
MTM.Transition: Moving from high school to college, facing new academic demands.

short_term: Complete all coding assignments on time
Improve time management by using scheduling tools
long_term: Gain proficiency in Java and other programming languages
Adapt to the academic rigor of college through consistent study habits

STM: Made a couple of friends in class, indicating social integration.
Roommate situation is awkward with minimal communication.

MTM.Summary: Navigating social integration and roommate dynamics.
MTM.Patterns: Making new friends, awkward roommate situation, seeking social connection
MTM.Goals: Build deeper friendships, resolve roommate issues, expand social network
MTM.Transition: Adjusting to living away from home, finding a social balance.

short_term: Host a small gathering to foster friendships
Address roommate issues through open communication
long_term: Develop a strong, supportive social network
Establish a harmonious living environment with roommates

STM: Feeling the strain of college life with existential crises at night.
Coping with the gloomy weather in NYC.

MTM.Summary: Struggling with college stress and existential crises.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling existential dread, coping with stress, adjusting to NYC life
MTM.Goals: Find coping mechanisms, maintain mental health, embrace college life
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from high school to the unstructured life of college.

short_term: Implement stress-relief techniques like meditation or yoga
Schedule regular breaks from study to maintain mental health
long_term: Develop sustainable mental health practices
Embrace and enjoy the college experience fully

STM: Concerns about the high cost of living in NYC, e.g., $6 coffee.
Feeling broke due to the expenses of college life.

MTM.Summary: Concerned with the financial demands of college life.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling broke, high cost of living, budget management
MTM.Goals: Create a budget, find ways to save, reduce unnecessary spending

short_term: Create and stick to a monthly budget
Explore student discounts and affordable eating options
long_term: Save a portion of any income or stipends for future expenses
Learn to live within means while still enjoying life

STM: Reflecting on the authenticity of happiness and social interactions.
Questioning life choices and feeling out of place in college.

MTM.Summary: Reflecting on authenticity and personal identity in college.
MTM.Patterns: Questioning life choices, feeling out of place, introspection
MTM.Goals: Find authentic self, clarify life goals, embrace college experience
MTM.Transition: Navigating identity and purpose in a new environment.

short_term: Journal regularly to process thoughts and feelings
Engage in campus activities that align with personal values
long_term: Clarify personal and career goals through reflective practices
Embrace authenticity in all aspects of life

STM: Struggling with coding assignments, particularly Java.
Expressing frustration with coding for fun.

MTM.Summary: Frustrated with coding assignments, particularly Java.
MTM.Patterns: Difficulty with coding, feeling overwhelmed, seeking enjoyment in tech
MTM.Goals: Overcome coding hurdles, find joy in coding, develop tech skills
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from a hobby to a formal academic pursuit.

short_term: Seek help from coding labs or online resources
Participate in coding workshops or hackathons
long_term: Develop a passion for technology and coding
Build a portfolio of personal projects showcasing tech skills

STM: Landed a summer internship thanks to a connection, aiming for a career in quant finance.
Started a group chat with new friends to discuss stocks and market trends, focusing on expanding financial knowledge.

MTM.Summary: Balancing coursework with new career aspirations in quant finance.
MTM.Patterns: Internship search, time management, financial analysis, networking
MTM.Goals: Secure a position in quant finance, improve coding skills, expand financial knowledge
MTM.Transition: Moving from academic focus to career development, adapting to industry demands.

short_term: Secure an internship in quant finance
Enhance coding proficiency in Python
Participate in financial analysis workshops
long_term: Establish a career in quantitative finance
Lead a financial modeling team
Pursue an advanced degree in finance or related field

STM: Had a coding breakthrough and plans to celebrate with takeout, indicating personal growth.
Went on a first date with someone from class, with plans for a second date, showing a developing romantic interest.

MTM.Summary: Navigating social integration with new romantic interests and friendships.
MTM.Patterns: Making new friends, dating, resolving roommate issues, expanding social network
MTM.Goals: Build deeper friendships, resolve roommate issues, develop romantic relationships
MTM.Transition: Adjusting to living away from home, finding a social balance, exploring romantic connections.

short_term: Strengthen existing friendships
Resolve current roommate conflicts
Explore potential romantic relationships
long_term: Build a supportive social network
Maintain long-term romantic relationships
Create a balanced social life in NYC

STM: Feeling overwhelmed by deadlines, indicating stress related to academic or professional life.
Struggling with the heat in the city, impacting physical comfort and well-being.

MTM.Summary: Struggling with college stress and environmental discomfort.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling existential dread, coping with stress, adjusting to NYC life, dealing with heat
MTM.Goals: Find coping mechanisms, maintain mental health, adapt to environmental challenges
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from high school to the unstructured life of college, facing new stressors.

short_term: Implement stress management techniques
Seek counseling if needed
Adjust to NYC's environmental challenges
long_term: Achieve a stable mental health balance
Develop resilience to urban stressors
Establish a consistent health routine

STM: Began researching crypto with intentions to invest, showing a shift towards digital assets.
Discovered trading tools to enhance market analysis, indicating a focus on financial improvement.

MTM.Summary: Shifting focus towards digital assets and market analysis.
MTM.Patterns: Budget management, crypto research, trading tools, financial improvement
MTM.Goals: Create a budget, invest in digital assets, enhance market analysis skills
MTM.Transition: Learning to manage finances independently, exploring new investment avenues.

short_term: Set up and follow a monthly budget
Make initial investments in cryptocurrencies
Improve financial market analysis skills
long_term: Build a diversified digital asset portfolio
Become financially independent
Develop a personal financial strategy

STM: Expressing gratitude for new connections and feeling like everything is falling into place.
Reflecting on the rapid evolution of the world and personal growth.

MTM.Summary: Reflecting on personal growth and gratitude for new connections.
MTM.Patterns: Questioning life choices, feeling out of place, introspection, expressing gratitude
MTM.Goals: Find authentic self, clarify life goals, embrace college experience, appreciate new connections
MTM.Transition: Navigating identity and purpose in a new environment, embracing change.

short_term: Regularly journal to clarify life goals
Engage in activities that foster personal growth
Express gratitude through actions and words
long_term: Develop a clear personal philosophy
Achieve a sense of purpose and fulfillment
Cultivate an attitude of lifelong learning

STM: Heard about blockchain integration in gaming, showing interest in emerging technology.
Discovered Ethereum and NFTs, exploring their potential impact on digital art and finance.

MTM.Summary: Exploring emerging technologies like blockchain and NFTs.
MTM.Patterns: Frustration with coding, interest in emerging tech, seeking enjoyment in tech
MTM.Goals: Overcome coding hurdles, find joy in coding, develop tech skills, understand blockchain
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from a hobby to a formal academic pursuit, expanding tech knowledge.

short_term: Complete a blockchain technology course
Overcome current coding challenges
Find joy in coding through personal projects
long_term: Specialize in blockchain and related technologies
Contribute to open-source tech projects
Lead or participate in tech innovation initiatives
